file_content.text: Hurry, slaves! Before that petty upstart blah blah blah....
Are you the Sith who killed my apprentices?
Murderer.
My lord. I assure you it was nothing personal. I'd just prefer to stay off Thanaton's hit list.
I hope you weren't calling me a petty upstart.
You weren't talking about me?
Oh come now, don't be offended. I have to say something to inspire these wretches.
Thanaton makes a fool of himself with this stupid rivalry.
This is such a waste.
No, he makes fools of us. While he remains clean and aloof.
Or do you really think I have nothing better to do than chase a pair of low apprentices across the blasted galaxy?
Now, as often happens when two Sith first meet, one of us isn't leaving this room alive. So I propose a toast. To the honorably defeated.
I will gladly drink to your death, Lord... I'm sorry, what was your name again?
To you, then.
Lord Cineratus. My father's choice. Call me Jevan. I can't say it will be a pleasure to die, but I'll try not to make a fool of myself.
Are you sure you won't consider joining me? Not that anyone would question your loyalty to Thanaton, of course.
We don't have to fight.
That's a tall order. Honor demands I die if I betray my master.
If you don't join me, I'll kill you.
You die either way.
But against you, I have a fighting chance.
I don't suppose your honor can be bought?
How about a stack of credits?
Now there's a thought. Alderaanian brandy isn't cheap.
I wouldn't sell out for anything less than a new set of starship stabilizers. Your little rogues mangled mine during the chase.
It's a deal.
Excellent, my lord. You may consider myself and my minions at your command.
Oh, and I found this on your apprentices. Some kind of key perhaps?
You'd best not linger. I wasn't the only Sith chasing these two. I'll cover your escape.
Forget it. You die.
I didn't think I was being unreasonable. But suit yourself. And good luck.
On second thought, who pays for loyalty these days?
Um, no. [Shock him]
You don't have a choice!
Join me! [Shock him]
Aggghhh!
Thank you. I was having a hard time bringing myself to really hate you. But that did the trick.
There isn't a chance I could be buried on Korriban is there? I hear the tomb of Naga Sadow is vacant.
Get me a nice tomb.
The odds are slim, but I could put in a good word for you.
